author: Kevin Stankiewicz
title: Cramer: Dominant US companies hold up in 'winner-take-all' stock market during the pandemic
description: "If you look at Amazon, I never wanted Amazon to be 7% of my charitable trust but I don't want to sell any Amazon. It's fantastic," CNBC's Jim Cramer said.
content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer said that dominant U.S. companies are further solidifying their positions during the coronavirus pandemic, evidenced by the Nasdaq 100 being almost even for the year. 
"This is the big triumphing over the little guy and if you don't mind ma… [+1676 chars]
